response.original_title: Baby Einstein: World Music - Swing, Sway, Play to a New Beat!
response.overview: Help your young child discover new musical realms with this program that features the enchanting rhythms of African drums, the haunting sounds of Celtic harp, the joyous rattle of Latin maracas and more, all arranged to be gentle on baby's ears. Images from around the globe present a visual context for the music, and special segments encourage kids to get involved through singing and other simple
response.title: Baby Einstein: World Music - Swing, Sway, Play to a New Beat!
